title: Schedule Appointment Within Working Hours
description: Verify that a user can successfully schedule an appointment for a regular service between 9:00 and 17:00 excluding lunch break 12:00-13:00.

steps.description: Navigate to the appointment scheduling page.
Select a regular service type.
Choose a date and a time slot between 9:00 and 12:00 or 13:00 and 17:00.
Fill in valid pet details and additional services if any.
Submit the appointment request.
Verify the appointment is confirmed and listed in the system.

title: Prevent Scheduling Over Lunch Break
description: Ensure that the system prevents scheduling any appointments during lunch break from 12:00 to 13:00.

steps.description: Access the appointment scheduling interface.
Select any service type.
Attempt to schedule an appointment within the time slot between 12:00 and 13:00.
Submit the appointment request.
Verify that an error is displayed preventing scheduling during lunch break.

title: Enforce Maximum Capacity of Two Appointments Per Time Slot
description: Verify that no more than two regular service appointments can be booked for the same time slot.

steps.description: Schedule two separate appointments for the same time slot for regular services.
Attempt to book a third appointment in the same time slot.
Confirm the system blocks the third booking and shows a capacity limit error.

title: Conflict Detection for Overlapping Pet Appointments
description: Ensure the system prevents overlapping appointments from being created for the same pet.

steps.description: Book an appointment for a pet at a specific time slot.
Attempt to book another appointment for the same pet that overlaps in time.
Verify that the system rejects the overlapping appointment with an appropriate conflict message.

title: Dynamic Pricing Based on Pet Weight and Additional Services
description: Validate that the displayed price updates in real-time when pet weight or additional services are changed during scheduling.

steps.description: Open the appointment scheduling form.
Input pet weight and select additional services.
Confirm the pricing display updates dynamically reflecting pet weight and added services in real-time.

title: Mobile Grooming Scheduling with Condominium Address Validation
description: Check that mobile grooming appointments allow selection of condominium addresses and validate address input correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to mobile grooming service scheduling.
Select condominium option and input address details.
Attempt to schedule within allowed time slots, ensuring no capacity limits.
Verify appointment confirmation with the correct condominium address stored and no capacity error.

title: Subscription Client Recurrence Appointment Generation
description: Verify the system automatically generates future appointments for subscription clients based on selected recurrence frequency (weekly, biweekly, monthly).

steps.description: Register a subscription client with a recurrence frequency.
Confirm initial appointment.
Check the system automatically generates all subsequent appointments according to the selected schedule.

title: Daycare Enrollment with Veterinary and Behavioral Info
description: Confirm that daycare service enrollment requires filling veterinary info and behavior tracking before submission.

steps.description: Open daycare service enrollment form.
Attempt to submit enrollment form without veterinary or behavior info.
Verify validation prompts user to fill mandatory veterinary and behavior data.
Complete all required fields.
Submit the form again.
Confirm successful enrollment submission.

title: Pet Hotel Check-In and Check-Out with Consent Signature
description: Test the pet hotel service check-in and check-out workflow including feeding info, additional services selection and digital consent signature capture.

steps.description: Initiate pet hotel check-in process.
Fill feeding instructions and select additional services.
Sign digital consent form using the provided interface.
Complete check-in and later check-out.
Verify all data is recorded accurately and check-out is processed correctly.

title: Admin Login with Supabase Authentication
description: Ensure administrators can log in using Supabase Auth with correct credential validation and session management.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login page.
Input valid admin credentials.
Submit login form.
Confirm successful login and session is established.
Log out of admin account.
Confirm session termination and login page displayed.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that only authorized roles can access admin panel and sensitive operations, while unauthorized access is denied.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard without login or as a non-admin account.
Check access is denied and user is redirected to login or error page.
Log in as admin and access admin dashboard.
Verify full access to appointment, client, subscription, and reports management functionalities.

title: Brazilian Format Validation for Date, WhatsApp Phone, and Currency
description: Ensure that input fields for dates, WhatsApp contacts, and currency values comply with Brazilian formatting standards.

steps.description: Input invalid date formats, WhatsApp phone numbers, and currency values in respective forms.
Verify validation errors are shown prompting correct Brazilian format.
Input correctly formatted date (DD/MM/YYYY), WhatsApp (+55 XX XXXXX-XXXX), and currency (R$ XXX,XX).
Confirm inputs accept the values without errors.

title: Notification Modals Display Success and Error States
description: Validate the notification system modals correctly show success alerts and error alerts upon various user actions.

steps.description: Perform a successful appointment booking.
Verify notification modal displays success message with proper UI variant.
Trigger an error such as booking outside working hours.
Confirm notification modal shows error message with corresponding variant styling.

title: Timezone UTC-3 (SÃ£o Paulo) Consistency in Date and Time Validations
description: Check that all date and time inputs, displays, and business logic respect UTC-3 timezone consistently across the application.

steps.description: Schedule appointments crossing date boundaries in UTC-3 timezone.
Verify displayed times and validations reflect UTC-3 accurately, including daylight savings where applicable.
Review generated reports and notifications timestamps.
Confirm all timestamps are consistent with UTC-3 timezone standards.

title: Responsive Layout Validation for Mobile-First Design
description: Ensure the application UI adapts correctly on various screen sizes emphasizing mobile usage.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and multiple mobile resolutions.
Verify all UI components including forms, modals, and dashboard adapt properly with no clipping or misalignment.
Check navigation and usability remain consistent and intuitive on all devices.

title: Administrative Dashboard Appointment Management
description: Verify administrators can view, create, edit, and cancel appointments through the dashboard successfully.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open the appointment management panel.
Create a new appointment through admin interface.
Confirm appointment is saved and visible in schedule.
Edit existing appointment details and save.
Verify changes are applied and reflected immediately.
Cancel an appointment.
Ensure appointment status updates to canceled and is not available for booking.

title: Error Handling on Network or Backend Failures
description: Ensure system gracefully handles failures such as network errors or backend service downtime with user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or Supabase backend unavailability during critical operations like login or booking.
Verify the system shows appropriate error notifications/modal dialogs.
Confirm no data corruption or partial submission occurs during failures.

title: Subscription Payment Controls and Status Accuracy
description: Validate that payments for subscription clients update client status accurately and all related appointments reflect payment state.

steps.description: Register subscription client and complete the payment process.
Ensure client status updates to active.
Check that all automatically generated appointments for the subscription reflect the payment status.
Simulate failed or pending payment scenario.
Confirm client status and appointments reflect non-paid state and prompt for payment.
